name: Into Magicland
summary: Into Magicland was a five-screen mini-adventure, which was given away with the January 1991 edition of Crash magazine in the UK. The player takes control of Dizzy's cousin Danny and it a prequel to the main game, ending with Dizzy teleporting to the first screen of Magicland Dizzy. This was the only time Danny appeared in the Dizzy series.
